sentences.en: A sort of free - will determinism is the true philosophy.
sentences.cn: 一种意志自由的决定论,才是真正的哲学.

sentences.en: Current, people regards economic norms normally determinism information will use.
sentences.cn: 目前, 人们通常把经济指标看作确定性信息来使用.

sentences.en: Determinism controlled by reductionism is becoming self - deficient more and more visibly.
sentences.cn: 受简约论思想支配的决定论和还原论越来越显示出自身的先天不足.

sentences.en: Determinism is the theory that the world, or nature is everywhere subject to causal law.
sentences.cn: 宿命论是认为世界或自然界处处受因果关系规律主配的理论.

sentences.en: Determinism is the view that every event has a t cause.
sentences.cn: 决定论认为万事皆有原因.

sentences.en: Einstein was distressed at this loss of determinism.
sentences.cn: 爱因斯坦为这种抛弃决定论的做法而担忧.

sentences.en: I don't believe in historical determinism.
Indeed, soft - determinists believe that determinism is a necessary condition for moral responsibility.
sentences.cn: 确实, 柔性决定论认为,决定论是道德责任的必要条件.

sentences.en: It is very easy to confuse hard - determinism with fatalism.
sentences.cn: 很容易将刚性决定论与宿命论混淆起来.

sentences.en: Old - fashioned determinism was what we may call hard determinism.
sentences.cn: 老式决定论是可称为刚性决定论的东西.

sentences.en: Perhaps freedom lies in expressing your own determinism, not somebody else's.
sentences.cn: 也许自由就是体现你的行为举止 、 而不是别人身上的先天性因素.

sentences.en: Soft - determinists claim that free will and determinism are compatible.
sentences.cn: 柔性决定论声称,自由意志与决定论两者可以并存.

sentences.en: That may sound like a clear - cut piece of biological determinism.
sentences.cn: 乍一听,这似乎是‘生物决定论’的典型例证.

sentences.en: The soft - determinist says, " No. " In fact, determinism is required for self - control.
sentences.cn: 柔性决定论者回答说: “ 不是. ” 事实上, 自我 控制需要决定论.

sentences.en: We can resolve the paradox in part by distinguishing determinism from predictability.
sentences.cn: 我们应该把决定论和可预见性区分开来,这样就能部分地解决这个自相矛盾的问题.

words.tran_cn: 确定性的；命运注定论的
决定因素；[数] 行列式

trans.tran_en: the belief that what you do and what happens to you are caused by things that you cannot control
